content.content:

What is my Facebook security code? It's in an email I received recently.

If you recently requested a Facebook security code, it's likely sent to your registered email address associated with your Facebook account. Please check your inbox and spam folder for an email from Facebook. The email should contain instructions on how to set up or retrieve your security information.
